attributes.action: To give all NHS staff an extra 4 weeks' paid holiday once the outbreak is over.
attributes.additional_details: During the Covid 19 outbreak NHS staff have not only worked beyond the call of duty, they have fearlessly put themselves on the line to help others. Granting this one off extra holiday would be a simple and easy gesture to the NHS staff, to show that their work has been appreciated during this very dark and difficult time and give them something to look forward to.
attributes.background: To give all NHS staff from an extra 4 weeks' paid holiday, to be taken whenever an individual wants, providing that it works within their department's staffing. This one-off extra paid 4 weeks' holiday could be rolled over for along as an individual wanted and could be taken in days or as a whole.

rejection.details:
Employers are responsible for agreeing annual leave arrangements with individual employees, so decisions about when leave is taken would be a matter for individual NHS employers, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published several petitions calling on the Government to reward NHS workers and other key workers for their efforts during the outbreak, which you might like to sign:

Incentivise NHS staff during the COVID19 outbreak by making wages untaxable: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Bonus for emergency services personnel working due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306

Increase NHS Police Fire & Ambulance Staff personal allowance to £35k for 12mths: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313322

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

Consider how to compensate key workers for their efforts during Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
